org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb
Interface IAeXMLDBDataSource

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeExistDataSource, IAeTaminoDataSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeExistDataSource, AeMonitoredXMLDBDataSource, AeTaminoDataSource, AeXMLDBDataSource
public interface IAeXMLDBDataSource

An interface that defines the set of methods needed to give access to the XMLDB database.

Method Summary
 void destroy()
          Destroys the data source, cleaning up any resouces associated with it.
 java.lang.Object getNativeDataSource()
          Returns the native data source for this database.
 IAeXMLDBConnection getNewConnection()
          Gets a new auto-commit Exist connection.
 IAeXMLDBConnection getNewConnection(boolean aAutoCommit)
          Gets a new Exist connection.
 

Method Detail

                                    throws AeXMLDBException

Throws:
AeException
AeXMLDBException

getNewConnection

public IAeXMLDBConnection getNewConnection(boolean aAutoCommit)
                                    throws AeXMLDBException
Gets a new Exist connection.

Throws:
AeException
AeXMLDBException

getNativeDataSource

public java.lang.Object getNativeDataSource()
Returns the native data source for this database. The return type will be implementation dependent.

destroy

public void destroy()
Destroys the data source, cleaning up any resouces associated with it. This is really only useful for testing purposes where the data source is destroyed between each test run and is only implemented for a pooled data source.
